Class PEAnomalyScanner

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class PEAnomalyScanner
extends AnomalyScanner
    Scans for anomalies and malformations in a PE file.

      • scan

        public scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> scan()
        Scans the PE and returns a (scala-)list of the anomalies found. Returns an empty list if no traits have been added.

        Use getAnomalies for a Java compatible list.

        Specified by:
        scan in class AnomalyScanner
        Returns:
        (scala-)list of anomalies found

      • getAnomalies

        public java.util.List<Anomaly> getAnomalies()
        Returns a list of anomalies that were found in the PE file.

        Returns:
        list of anomalies found
